wsslots-desc: Improves support for slots in MediaWiki.
wsslots-no-such-revision: No revision found for the given title, pageid or oldid.
apihelp-editslot-summary: Create and edit slots on pages.
apihelp-editslot-param-title: Title of the page to edit. Cannot be used together with pageid.
apihelp-editslot-param-pageid: Page ID of the page to edit. Cannot be used together with title.
apihelp-editslot-param-text: Page content to insert or append.
apihelp-editslot-param-slot: The name of the slot to edit.
apihelp-editslot-param-append: Whether to append the text to the existing slot content
apihelp-editslots-summary: Edit multiple slots on a page. Note that slot parameters are automatically create from keys in 'WSSlotsDefinedSlots' with a 'slot_' prefix
apihelp-editslots-param-title: Title of the page to edit. Cannot be used together with pageid.
apihelp-editslots-param-pageid: Page ID of the page to edit. Cannot be used together with title.
apihelp-editslots-param-append: Whether to append the text to the existing slot content
apihelp-editslots-param-slot_main: Content of the main slot to insert or append. Other slots are defined equivalent.
apihelp-parsetemplates-summary: Parse the templates on a page.
apihelp-parsetemplates-param-title: Title of the page to parse. Cannot be used together with pageid or oldid.
apihelp-parsetemplates-param-pageid: Page ID of the page to parse. Cannot be used together with title or oldid.
apihelp-parsetemplates-param-oldid: Revision ID of the content to parse. Cannot be used together with title or pageid.
apihelp-parsetemplates-param-slot: The name of the slot to parse.
apihelp-readslot-param-title: Title of the page to read. Cannot be used together with pageid.
apihelp-readslot-param-pageid: Page ID of the page to read. Cannot be used together with title.
apihelp-readslot-param-slot: The name of the slot to read.
wsslots-apierror-slotdoesnotexist: The slot '$1' does not exist on page '$2'.
wsslots-apierror-nottext: The content model '$1' cannot be returned, because it is not text.
wsslots-error-invalid-wikipage-object: The given WikiPage object is not valid, since it does not have a Title.
